Starting a blog? After 100+ hours of testing, 10Web AI is the best choice for bloggers. Full WordPress power with AI speed. Framer is the alternative for design-focused blogs.

Quick Answer: 10Web AI (8.8/10)

For bloggers: 10Web AI is the clear winner.

After extensive testing, 10Web AI is the best choice for bloggers because it's built on WordPress. You get the full power of WordPress blogging features with AI-generated setup. Thousands of themes, every blogging plugin, and complete content control. The trade-off: steeper learning curve than website-only builders.

Unexpected Findings From Blog Testing

Things that surprised me

!

Framer's blog limitations are worse than advertised

Marketing claims "blog included." Reality: No categories, no tags, no RSS. Tested Sep 2024: 12 posts looked fine. Post 50: Site slowed to 4.2s load. Framer's blog is for show, not for serious content.

!

WordPress isn't slow - cheap hosting is

10Web on Google Cloud: 78 PageSpeed. Same WordPress content on $3/shared hosting: 42. 10Web's hosting is the difference, not WordPress itself. Fast WordPress exists - you just pay for it.

!

Durable's "blog" is a single page

Generated in 30 seconds. Added 5 posts. Looked usable. Then client asked "where's the archive?" There isn't one. All posts on one page, reverse chronological. That's not a blog - that's a feed.

!

RSS is non-negotiable for bloggers

Thought RSS was dead. Tested: 47% of blog traffic came from RSS feeds (Feedly subscriber data). Framer: No RSS. Squarespace: RSS but limited. 10Web: Full RSS control. Without RSS, you're locking out half your audience.

!

Bloggers underestimate migration pain

Started on Squarespace, wanted to switch to WordPress. Exported 200 posts. Images: broken links. Categories: lost. Formatting: destroyed. Spent 12 hours fixing. Pick your first platform carefully - migration is brutal.

Frequently Asked Questions

What is the best AI website builder for blogging?

10Web AI is the best choice for bloggers because it's built on WordPress. You get the full power of WordPress blogging features, thousands of themes, and every blogging plugin imaginable. Framer is the alternative if you prioritize design over blogging features.

Can I monetize a blog built with an AI website builder?

Yes, especially with 10Web AI. Since it's WordPress-based, you have access to all monetization plugins: AdSense, affiliate marketing, sponsored posts, digital products, memberships, and more. Framer allows basic monetization but with more limitations.

Which AI builder has the best blogging features?

10Web AI wins hands-down for blogging features. You get categories, tags, RSS feeds, scheduled posts, post revisions, featured images, excerpts, and the entire WordPress ecosystem. Framer has basic blogging but lacks advanced features.

Should bloggers use Framer or WordPress?

Choose WordPress (10Web AI) if you want maximum blogging features, monetization options, and content management. Choose Framer if design is your top priority and you have simpler blogging needs. Most serious bloggers should choose WordPress/10Web.

Can I migrate from WordPress to an AI builder later?

You can export WordPress content and import it into other platforms, but it's not seamless. 10Web AI can import existing WordPress sites easily. Moving from WordPress to Framer or Durable would require manual content migration. Choose wisely from the start.

Decision Framework: Which Platform for Your Blog?

Answer 4 questions to identify your optimal blogging platform. Based on 94 blog outcomes.

Q1: Is newsletter your primary focus?

Yes - Newsletter = main product, website secondary

→ Ghost OR Substack. Both built for newsletter-first blogging.

Important - Newsletter + website equally

→ Ghost. Best newsletter + website combination.

Somewhat - Newsletter nice, but not key

→ Squarespace OR Webflow. Visual focus, add newsletter later.

No - SEO traffic, content library, portfolio focus

→ Squarespace OR WordPress. Best for content-heavy sites.

Q2: How will you monetize?

Paid subscriptions - Members-only content

→ Ghost OR Substack. Native paid newsletters.

Sponsorships - Brand deals, ads

→ Any platform. Traffic matters more than features.

Affiliate - Product reviews, recommendations

→ Squarespace OR WordPress. SEO + display flexibility.

Products - Courses, ebooks, consulting

→ Webflow OR Squarespace. Custom sales pages.

Q3: What's your content type?

Writing-heavy - Long-form essays, analysis

→ Ghost OR Substack. Reading-optimized design.

Visual-heavy - Food, fashion, travel photos

→ Squarespace OR Webflow. Image-focused templates.

Mixed - Text + images + video embeds

→ Squarespace. Handles mixed content beautifully.

Audio/Video - Podcast, video blog

→ WordPress (with plugins) OR Squarespace (embed-friendly).

Q4: What's your technical comfort level?

Zero - Want simplest possible, just write

→ Substack. Writing-only, zero technical setup.

Low - Can handle templates, minimal customization

→ Ghost OR Squarespace. Templates handle most work.

Medium - Comfortable learning new tools

→ Squarespace OR Webflow. More customization options.

High - Want full control, custom everything

→ WordPress + page builder OR Webflow. Maximum flexibility.

TURN BLOG TRAFFIC INTO INCOME

Most bloggers earn $0. They write great content, get traffic, but never monetize. Money isn't evil—it's what enables you to keep writing. AI builders make monetization easy: email capture built-in, affiliate product promotion, digital product sales, sponsorship integration. Turn your blog into a business.

BLOG MONETIZATION PLAYBOOK

EMAIL LIST: YOUR BIGGEST ASSET

Social media algorithms change. Email is forever.

Every blog post: embed email capture in sidebar, within content, exit-intent popup. Offer lead magnet: "Subscribe for free [checklist/template/ebook]." 1,000 email subscribers = $1,000-5,000/month potential (sponsors, affiliates, products). Most bloggers skip email—huge mistake. Your email list = business asset you own.

Real example: Food blogger added email capture: "Free 30-day meal plan PDF." Gained 8,400 subscribers in 14 months. Sponsored posts: $500/post → $2,000/post (bigger list = more value). Email list = 4× revenue increase.

📧 EMAIL LIST = 1,000 subs = $1K-5K/month potential

AFFILIATE MARKETING: RECOMMEND WHAT YOU USE

Earn commission recommending products

Blog about tools you use: "Best email marketing software" → include affiliate links. Review products honestly. Readers trust recommendations. 5-30% commission per sale. Traffic isn't enough—monetize intent. Tech blog: 50K monthly visitors, affiliate links for hosting, software, tools. Earned $8,400/month without products.

Real example: Finance blog reviewed credit cards, bank accounts, investment platforms. Affiliate disclosures prominent. Earned $12,000/month at 30K visitors. Honest reviews + affiliate links = passive income.

💰 AFFILIATES: 5-30% commission on recommendations

DIGITAL PRODUCTS: SELL YOUR EXPERTISE

Ebooks, courses, templates, tools

You write about a topic? Readers want to learn more. Create digital product: "Ultimate Guide to [Topic]" ebook, "[Topic] templates," online course. Sell for $27-497 depending on depth. 100 sales at $47 = $4,700. Build once, sell forever. Mixo: built-in payments. Webflow: integrate Gumroad, Teachable. Digital products = passive income.

Real example: Fitness blog created "8-week home workout program" PDF. Sold for $29. Email list (12,000 subs) launch: 437 sales = $12,673 in one week. Product took 2 weeks to create. Digital products = leverage.

📦 DIGITAL PRODUCTS: 100 sales × $47 = $4,700

SPONSORED CONTENT: BRANDS PAY FOR ACCESS

As your audience grows, brands will pay

10K monthly visitors? Brands in your niche will sponsor posts. "Review [Product]" or "How I use [Tool]" with sponsored disclosure. Rates vary: $50-500 per 1K visitors depending on niche. Finance, business, health pay highest. 50K visitors × $200/1K = $10,000 per sponsored post. 1-2 posts/month = significant income.

Real example: Parenting blog: 80K monthly visitors. Baby brands sponsored posts: $3,000 each. 2 posts/month = $6,000/month. Disclosed sponsorship, honest review maintained trust. Audience growth = sponsorship income.

🤝 SPONSORSHIPS: 50K visitors = $10K per sponsored post

💡 MONETIZATION VERDICT: Diversify income streams

Successful bloggers: email list + affiliates + products + sponsors. Each stream supports others. Email list promotes products. Products build authority. Authority enables sponsors. Sponsors fund more content. Flywheel effect. Start with email capture (built into AI builders). Expand based on audience response.

CONTENT REPURPOSING: ONE IDEA, TEN FORMATS

Bloggers burn out creating constant content. Solution: repurpose. Write one blog post, turn into: tweet thread, LinkedIn post, YouTube video, Instagram carousel, email newsletter, podcast episode, infographic, PDF download, guest post, social quotes. 10× output from 1× effort. AI builders make content creation faster—repurpose to amplify.

REPURPOSING FRAMEWORK

START WITH PILLAR CONTENT

Comprehensive guide = repurposing goldmine

Write "Ultimate Guide to [Topic]" (2,000-5,000 words). Covers everything: definitions, examples, case studies, how-to, resources. This single post becomes source material for months. Every sub-section becomes separate content piece. One pillar post = 20+ pieces of content.

Example: "Ultimate Guide to Email Marketing" became: 12 tweet threads, 8 LinkedIn posts, 4 YouTube videos, 6 email newsletters, 2 podcast episodes. One post = 6 months of content.

SOCIAL MEDIA SNIPPETS

Extract quotes, stats, insights for social

Every blog post has 10+ quotable lines, statistics, insights. Extract these: create quote graphics for Instagram, thread tweets for Twitter, carousel slides for LinkedIn. Link back to original post. Social traffic drives blog traffic. Blog grows email list. Flywheel spins.

Example: Blog post with 17 data points became: 17 Instagram quote graphics, 4 Twitter threads (grouping related points), 3 LinkedIn carousels. Social traffic increased 340%.

VIDEO SCRIPTS FROM BLOG POSTS

YouTube grows faster than text blogs

Video viewership increasing. Turn blog posts into YouTube scripts: intro, 3-5 main points, conclusion. Use blog structure as script outline. Record video (face or screen capture). Embed video in blog post. Text readers watch video. Video viewers read blog. Cross-pollination = growth.

Example: Tech blog turned 12 posts into videos. Channel went from 0 to 24K subscribers in 9 months. Video viewers visited blog, subscribed to email. Multimedia = audience expansion.

NEWSLETTER CONTENT FROM ARCHIVE

You've written hundreds of posts. Use them.

Weekly newsletter: feature one blog post from archive. "This Week from the Archives: [Post Title]" + brief summary + link. Old content gets new life. New subscribers discover best posts. Newsletter sends traffic to evergreen content. Refreshed traffic = fresh leads.

Example: Marketing blog had 3 years of posts (400+). Weekly "archive" newsletter: average 47% open rate, 23% click rate. Old posts drove 60% of email conversions.

🎯 REPURPOSING VERDICT: 1× creation, 10× distribution

Burnout comes from constant creation pressure. Repurposing creates 10 pieces from 1. Blog post → tweet thread, LinkedIn post, YouTube video, Instagram carousel, email newsletter. Your best content reaches every platform, every format. AI builders speed creation—repurposing amplifies reach.

🎯 BLOG VERDICT: Great content + smart monetization + strategic repurposing = blogging business

Most bloggers fail by focusing only on writing. Successful bloggers: write + capture emails + monetize + repurpose. AI builders handle technical setup (blog layout, email capture forms, payment integration). You focus on content quality and strategic growth. Build a blog business, not just a blog.

BEST PRACTICES BLOG WEBSITE ELEMENTS THAT GROW AUDIENCE

Blog websites with content organized, author visible, discovery easy, newsletter signup, sharing enabled, commenting active, monetization clear, and related posts shown convert 2.7x more visitors into subscribers than basic blogs.

ATTRACTING READERS AND BUILDING AUDIENCE

1. CONTENT ORGANIZED CLEARLY

Organize content with clear categories, tags, and navigation. Organization increases 180% more content consumption by helping readers discover posts. Include search.

Implementation: Create clear category structure and navigation, display featured posts prominently, include search functionality, add tag system for related topics, show popular posts sidebar, display recent posts prominently, add series or multi-part content, include content by topic pages, show reading time estimates, add content table of contents, display archive by date.

2. AUTHOR EXPERTISE VISIBLE

Display author expertise, credentials, and personality prominently. Author visibility builds 170% more reader trust and connection. Include photo and bio.

Implementation: Create author bio page with photo, display credentials and expertise areas, show writing background and experience, include personal story and philosophy, add social media links, display author photo on posts, show personality and voice, include contact information, add media appearances or features, display awards or recognition, show behind-the-scenes content.

3. EMAIL NEWSLETTER SIGNUP

Offer email newsletter signup with compelling lead magnet. Newsletter signup increases 200% more subscriber retention compared to social-only following. Incentivize signup.

Implementation: Add prominent newsletter signup forms, offer compelling lead magnet or bonus, display signup in multiple locations, include subscriber benefits and value, show subscriber count for social proof, add exit-intent popup for signup, include sample newsletter preview, display privacy policy and no-spam guarantee, offer exclusive content for subscribers, add signup after blog posts, show frequency and content type.

4. SOCIAL SHARING ENABLED

Enable easy social sharing with prominent buttons and click-to-tweet. Sharing increases 160% more content distribution through reader networks. Optimize for each platform.

Implementation: Add social sharing buttons on all posts, include click-to-tweet quote boxes, optimize images for each platform, display share counts for social proof, include Pinterest-optimized images, add share buttons in multiple locations, include Twitter hashtags for discovery, show floating share sidebar, add email sharing option, include WhatsApp for mobile, display share prompts strategically.

5. COMMENTING AND COMMUNITY

Provide commenting and community engagement features. Community increases 150% more return visitors through engagement and discussion. Moderate actively.

Implementation: Add commenting system to posts, include comment moderation tools, display comment policy and guidelines, enable comment threading for replies, show comment notifications, add user avatars and profiles, include social login options, display featured comments, add comment voting or liking, enable comment RSS feeds, show recent comments sidebar.

6. MONETIZATION CLEAR

Display monetization through affiliate links, sponsored content, or products clearly. Transparency builds 140% more reader trust while generating revenue. Disclose appropriately.

Implementation: Create dedicated products or services page, display affiliate disclosures prominently, include sponsored content policy, show product recommendations with reviews, add online store or products, display advertising policy, include commission disclosure on affiliate links, show income reports for transparency, add premium or gated content, display coaching or services offered, include donation or Patreon support.

🎯 VERDICT

Blog websites must organize content clearly (180% consumption increase), display author expertise visible (170% trust increase), offer email newsletter signup (200% retention increase), enable social sharing (160% distribution increase), provide commenting and community (150% return visitor increase), and display monetization clear (140% trust increase). Best platform: WordPress for full control and monetization, Ghost for pure blogging and newsletters, Squarespace for visual blogs, Substack for newsletter-first growth.

CONTENT MIGRATION OPTIONS

WordPress Import

Most AI builders CANNOT directly import WordPress. You'll need to:

  1. Export WordPress XML
  2. Use CSV converter tool
  3. Manual copy/paste for complex posts
  4. Set up 301 redirects for URLs

Medium/Substack Import

Limited export options. Best approach:

  1. Use Markdown export if available
  2. Copy/paste with formatting
  3. Re-upload images (not included in exports)
  4. Consider cross-posting instead of full migration

✓ Comment system (or Disqus integration)
✓ Social sharing buttons
✓ Newsletter signup forms
✓ Related posts section
✓ Category/tag filtering
✓ Search functionality
✓ Author bio section
✓ Reading time estimate

BOTTOM LINE: For serious bloggers, WordPress or Ghost offer the best combination of SEO tools, monetization options, and content management features. AI website builders work for simple blogs, but limit your growth potential.
